info.name: Restful-Booker
info.description: # _**API documentation for API restful-booker**_ ### _**Features:**_ - Create Auth - Create Booking - Get Booking - Update Booking - Delete Booking

item.name: Auth

request.description: ##### _**This Api is used to create a new auth token**_

item.description: **This Folder contins Api that uses to create a new auth token to use for accessing** _**" Update Booking " and "Delete Booking"**_

request.description:
##### _**This Api is used to update current booking**_

**Generated from** cURL: curl -X PUT  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-H 'Accept: application/json'  
\-H 'Cookie: token=abc123'  
\-d '{  
"firstname" : "James",  
"lastname" : "Brown",  
"totalprice" : 111,  
"depositpaid" : true,  
"bookingdates" : {  
"checkin" : "2018-01-01",  
"checkout" : "2019-01-01"  
},  
"additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"  
}'

exec: pm.test("Check Body Contains BookingDates and is Object", function () {
pm.test("Check bookingdates Contains CheckIn In Body", function () {
pm.test("Response has all expected keys", function () {
pm.test("Check bookingdates Contains CheckOut In Body", function () {
pm.test("Check Body Contains Additional Details", function () {

request.description: ##### _**This Api is used to**_ _**retrieve all data after updating current booking**_

##### _This API is used to delete an existing booking by its unique booking ID. Once the request is successfully processed, the booking is permanently removed from the system._  

**Generated from** cURL: curl -X DELETE  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-H 'Cookie: token=abc123'
##### _This API is used to retrieve booking data after a booking has been deleted_

item.description:
**This Folder provides endpoints to manage bookings in the system. It supports**

- Create Booking
    
- Get Booking
    
- Update Booking,
    
- Deleting Booking
